item.title: EXAELIA
item.description:
Towards flying testbeds for novel long-range aircraft. Developing radically-changed aircraft concepts comes with high investments and risks.

The objective of EXAELIA is to evaluate flying testbeds that are needed for de-risking the development of those disruptive future long-range aircraft.

Our main contributions to this project are developing a free-flying aeroelastic aircraft model and designing a nonlinear data-driven control for the next generation of commerical aircraft.
